title: NYSE’s Tokenized Stocks Create More Questions for Crypto’s Relevance
full_text: NYSE’s Tokenized Stocks Create More Questions for Crypto’s Relevance. Given that Bitcoin was created to circumvent traditional finance, what are we even doing here?. On Monday, the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) announced the development of its tokenized securities platform for trading U.S. stocks via blockchain technology. The new platform is said to enable trad… [+3706 chars]
